xstampp.ui.editors.interfaces

Interface ITextEditor

  • All Superinterfaces:
    org.eclipse.jface.viewers.ISelectionProvider

    public interface ITextEditor
extends org.eclipse.jface.viewers.ISelectionProvider
    defines a set of functions and constants to communcate with a TextEditor
    Author:
    Lukas Balzer

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description

      constant for addressing the background color

      constant for applying an italic style to some text

    • Method Detail

      • setStyle

        void setStyle(java.lang.String style)
        Set style to chosen format if text gets modified or toolBar item pressed.
        Parameters:
        style - one of the constants defined in ITextEditor

      • setStyleColor

        void setStyleColor(java.lang.String color,
                   org.eclipse.swt.graphics.RGB rgb)
        Parameters:
        color - one of FOREGROUND and BACKGROUND
        rgb - the new rgbColor

      • setFont

        void setFont(java.lang.String fontString,
             int fontSize)
        changes the font
        Parameters:
        fontString - the name of the new Font
        fontSize - the Size in points

      • setFontSize

        void setFontSize(java.lang.String style,
                 int fontSize)
        changes the font size
        Parameters:
        style - one of FONT_SIZE_DOWN,FONT_SIZE_UP,FONT_SIZE
        fontSize - the font size of the text in points

      • setBullet

        void setBullet(java.lang.String type)
        Set a bullet to TextField.
        Parameters:
        type - one of DOT_LIST,"NUM_LIST"

      • setEditToolContributor

        void setEditToolContributor(ITextEditContribution contributor)
        registers the contributor by the editor so that the editor can react to its calls
        Parameters:
        contributor - the contributor, with which the user can manipulate the Text
